template&lt; class T &gt;
concept bool TagSpecifier = /* implementation-defined */;
}}

The concept {{tt|TagSpecifier&lt;T&gt;}} is satisfied if and only if {{tt|T}} is a tag specifier for use with {{ltt|cpp/experimental/ranges/utility/tagged|ranges::tagged}}.

The Ranges TS provides a set of tag specifiers in {{header|experimental/ranges/algorithm}}. Users cannot define their own tag specifiers.
